name: Employee Information
description: Centralized storage of employee details, including personal information, contact details, and employment history.

name: Leave Management
description: Efficient management of employee leave requests, approvals, and tracking of available leave balances.

name: Attendance Tracking
description: Real-time monitoring of employee attendance, with options for manual adjustments and reporting.

name: Performance Evaluation
description: Objective assessment of employee performance through customizable evaluation criteria and feedback mechanisms.

name: Training and Development
description: Tracking employee training needs, scheduling sessions, and monitoring progress to enhance professional development.

name: Payroll Processing
description: Automated payroll calculations, tax deductions, and salary disbursement for accurate and timely payments.

name: Task and Project Management
description: Assigning tasks, tracking project progress, and ensuring effective collaboration within teams.

name: Employee Communication
description: Facilitating internal communication through announcements, messaging, and discussion forums.

name: Analytics and Reporting
description: Generating comprehensive reports on various HR metrics, helping in data-driven decision-making.
